title: Sparkle Slime Balloon
summaries: The Sparkle Slime Balloon is a Hardmode novelty consumable item. When thrown at players, enemies, and NPCs, it will inflict the Sparkle Slime debuff for 30 seconds. This debuff is only cosmetic and deals no damage. The Diva Slime moves in after throwing or discarding a Sparkle Slime Balloon into Shimmer.

<linked>Queen Slime</linked> always drops 25–75 Sparkle Slime Balloons upon her defeat. They are also dropped by <linked>Jungle Mimics</linked>, which spawn in <linked>Celebrationmk10</linked> and <linked>Get fixed boi</linked> worlds.

statistics.Sell: 40 CC
